sub_topics.name: index
sub_topics.example: I would like to see the live UV Index display added to the temp, humidity, rain and wind on the mobile webpage. Can this be added?

sub_topics.name: forecast
sub_topics.example: looks great but missing the UV forecast - in a country like Aus this is pretty important ;)

sub_topics.name: sun
sub_topics.example: I liked the new mobile weather pages. Would have liked a brief descriptive text on the weather in addition to the data. Also does not reference the sun or whether it will be overcast etc and a UV measurement would be useful. Liked the page layout and ease of navigation. Well done.

sub_topics.name: rating
sub_topics.example: Great App even better with UV rating.

sub_topics.name: alert
sub_topics.example: Can you please include uv alerts on this mobile site. Thank you

sub_topics.name: link
sub_topics.example: Looks good. Would there be a spot on the page for fire danger ratings or a quick link?

sub_topics.name: warning
sub_topics.example: Looks great! One point for consideration is to make it a separate app allowing for push notifications of weather warnings and fire warnings.

sub_topics.name: danger
sub_topics.example: Good mobile site. Can we have fire danger added, and related? Eg today is total fire ban.

sub_topics.name: rating
sub_topics.example: A very important, but missing, feature is the fire danger rating.

sub_topics.name: fight
sub_topics.example: This page is really well done. Probably the best mobile page I've used. Any chance of getting fdi info when it's being forecasted for firefighters to use? Would be handy to have the info up to date without going through vicfire

sub_topics.name: rainfall
sub_topics.example: Under chance of any rain can you add the estimated rainfall amount to be expected in each timeframe such as 5% chance of 5-10mm or 55% chance of < 1mm or 80% chance of 40 - 50mm?

sub_topics.name: colour
sub_topics.example: On the week's predictions Page for a given city or location, is suggest making the little weather symbols (for sunny / rain / storms, etc) full colour rather than symbols in a two tone blue and white, to make it easier to differentiate them at a glance.

sub_topics.name: accuracy
sub_topics.example: Would be good if you could put the amount of rainfall in the data

sub_topics.name: predict
sub_topics.example: While the seven day forcasts seem to have estimated rain, and today's forcast has 3 time zones with probability, there is nowhere on today's forcast which gives the predicted rain, either in total, or in amounts corresponding to the time periods.

sub_topics.name: time
sub_topics.example: It would be good to know approx. what time rainfall is expected for a particular day (in addition to expected amount and chance).

sub_topics.name: flood
sub_topics.example: I like it. It's simple to navigate. Has the main info that we need straight away and a link to the full site for any in depth info that we need. I use the site all the time as we are flood zoned and do flood so it will be good to have quick access through an app.

sub_topics.name: time|day|date
sub_topics.example: Thank you thank you thank you! great site. Perhaps add the last time the forecast was updated.

sub_topics.name: wind
sub_topics.example: Your mobile site is very good and easy to read. Any chance you could include forecast wind speed and direction as well? This is important to us.

sub_topics.name: rain
sub_topics.example: I'd find the mobile page much more useful if the 'possible rainfall' figures appeared with the possibility percentage for each 3-hour period shown for the current day, as we see in the non-mobile beta town forecast pages. This is the only reason I don't use the mobile site forecast pages.

sub_topics.name: location
sub_topics.example: Very excited to hear you are developing an app! Would love for it to be able to do 7 day forecasts, automatically give you forecasts based on your location. Anything like your website would be great!

sub_topics.name: summary
sub_topics.example: Looks great. Can you add a forecast summary, like Sunny, Windy, a Cloudy to each day?

sub_topics.name: speed
sub_topics.example: Forecast wind direction and speed would be good

sub_topics.name: direction
sub_topics.example: I would like to see more details about the wind strength and direction. Wind is more dangerous than rain however most sites have highly detailed rain forecast and minimal details on forecast wind conditions.

sub_topics.name: graph
sub_topics.example: I would like to see a small graph tracking/predicting wind strength over 24 hours

sub_topics.name: knots
sub_topics.example: As a sailor I love the wind speed reflected in knots as well as kph. Can this be applied consistently throughout the site? Also - a UV index?

sub_topics.name: time|day|date
sub_topics.example: i Hi, I'm a big fan of your mobile website and use it as my weather app. A useful addition would be to add wind info for each day on the 6-day forecast page. A min-max range (ie: 7-24 km/h) should fit in and provide a decent overview for each day.

sub_topics.name: phase
sub_topics.example: As a keen amateur fisherman, fisho's around oz are crying out for an app that shows detailed, updated info on tides, swell, wind and moon phases not just temperature and rainfall.

sub_topics.name: icon|sign
sub_topics.example: Moon and sun icons are out of sync with celestial movements.

sub_topics.name: time|day|date
sub_topics.example: Looks good, but a little too bland. How about adding photo of the day. That would make it something to watch out for! Also moon phases and other astronomical interests. Showing tide times would be nice.

sub_topics.name: tides
sub_topics.example: Looks great.....would be great if had swell and tide info as well in the app.

sub_topics.name: moon
sub_topics.example: I think your site is fantastic. Does it have tides and moon and swell chart? If not it needs it. Thank you

sub_topics.name: favourite
sub_topics.example: Love it! Would be great if you could add more than one location as a favourite.

sub_topics.name: current
sub_topics.example: The current location selection on the mobile website is not working.

sub_topics.name: wrong
sub_topics.example: Results are being returned for the wrong locations. For example, my saved bookmark for Mt Ginini in the ACT returns a forecast for Melbourne. This has started happening recently (this week?).

sub_topics.name: radar
sub_topics.example: Nice! The UI is good clean and easy to read. Like the zoom on the radar. Did not remember my location but that might be a browser issue.

sub_topics.name: nearest
sub_topics.example: Love the new app but location is out of whack. Says I'm in North Altona though I'm sitting in my house in Altona near the beach! Thx

sub_topics.name: location
sub_topics.example: Love the design and layout of site. Would be great as an app. Only issue is the current location is coming up saying Yatala when the is not a suburb where located. Does locate the nearest station from where the weather was being read though.

sub_topics.name: near
sub_topics.example: My location is Mosman, which links me to the weather station in the harbour, which, according to this website, is 6.2 kms away. The Sydney station is only 1.7 kms. Why does the 'Use my current location...' not link me to Observatory Hill? The weather there is much closer to that experienced at Mosman than the Middle of the harbour!

sub_topics.name: observation
sub_topics.example: Good work bom. Would be great to get observations of surrounding three stations. In my case ulladulla, point perp and Nowra.

sub_topics.name: different|wrong|incorrect
sub_topics.example: When you type in to view Berwick, it is such a false reading as it takes the details from Ferny Ck? Why is this? Ferny Ck has such different conditions, so the Berwick area us always usually a false reeding? ;( Can't it be aligned to a different station more relevant?

sub_topics.name: radar
sub_topics.example: Overlay weather station observations onto radar?

sub_topics.name: android
sub_topics.example: Good mobile site any plans for a android app soon?

sub_topics.name: iphone
sub_topics.example: Love it. I can now get rid of all my other weather iOS apps. When does this become an app?

sub_topics.name: download
sub_topics.example: Great, but how do I download the app?

sub_topics.name: please|make
sub_topics.example: Like the site can you make it an app. That will give me alerts to weather events??

sub_topics.name: mobile|device
sub_topics.example: This is a great start. Can you make it into an appn so it can be better accessed via mobile devices?

sub_topics.name: location
sub_topics.example: Site keeps defaulting to a location I viewed once. When I set a different place as my favourite, it still goes back to the old location

sub_topics.name: list
sub_topics.example: How can I create a list of favourites and the pick from that list? Otherwise loving the new mobile site.

sub_topics.name: current
sub_topics.example: Looks the goods. Needs a rainfall metre in current weather section, not just 7 day forecast. Perhaps a current location shortcut button next to the favourite button too would be helpful.

sub_topics.name: change
sub_topics.example: Great overall. My only comment is that can't seem to change the Favourite location , it seems to default back to the 1st place I was when I loaded the site . I'm viewing on iPhone 4s with ios7.1 .

sub_topics.name: save
sub_topics.example: The app won't save my location as a favourite. The star does change colour when touched.

sub_topics.name: severe
sub_topics.example: I am very frustrated that BOM has issued no weather warnings during last days. I live in the Tinderry Mtns and rely on warnings for planning. We have had severe temperatures (-4C with wind to -8C), snow from Tuesday evening, ice on all vegetation (what US calls an ice storm). Warnings wood have helped me with firewood planning, waterpipes, etc; and others with livestock.

sub_topics.name: link
sub_topics.example: Love it, really easy to read, big and bright l like how you got your quick links, weather, radar and warnings. Cant wait for more updates. Looking forward to it. Thank you heaps, keep it up guys!

sub_topics.name: show warnings
sub_topics.example: Will it also show severe weather warnings?

sub_topics.name: local
sub_topics.example: Very pleased with the site so far. Simple, easy to to use platform and informative. Will you have local warning push messages?

sub_topics.name: symbol|icon
sub_topics.example: So far so good except I think you need to change the triangle symbol top right. I know its a warning but I usually only get it to warn me of an error.

sub_topics.name: map
sub_topics.example: I am unable to get appropriate radar coverage map for Launceston region - defaults to SE Tasmania

sub_topics.name: work|load|problem
sub_topics.example: The link to the Bairnsdale radar has stopped working ... Eg if your looking at weather for yarram, then switch to radar ... No radar appears

sub_topics.name: rain
sub_topics.example: Thanks for the new mobile website - it's extremely useful! I love the rain detail and easy access to the radar.

sub_topics.name: wind
sub_topics.example: Luv the new m.bom site but would love the 'weather observations' on the radar ie wind direction arrows temp/wind strength/rain measure same as the bom radar site option. Cheers and keep up the good work.

sub_topics.name: zoom
sub_topics.example: I like the uncluttered screen layouts and the easy to use zoom feature in the radar. Thank you.

sub_topics.name: road
sub_topics.example: Very good. Additional settings for radar eg. Roads, railways, observations would be nice.

sub_topics.name: observations
sub_topics.example: Like your new mobile site however the radar is no use for me as a cyclist. I need weather observations (temp and wind) which are not provided - at least I could not see how to turn them on as you can on the main site

sub_topics.name: rain
sub_topics.example: I want to know how much rain since 9am on latest observations in the front page. MetEye tells me that with the 'places' page

sub_topics.name: radar
sub_topics.example: The new mobile site is great. I like the layout of the forecast and especially the %chance of rain and expected amount for all of the days. Radar is good on mobile, the radar is the coolest thing ever. It would be good to have a like to another page that has weather observations maybe a graph or table of things like rain, temperature or wind.

sub_topics.name: current
sub_topics.example: I often visit the BOM website to check on current observations and check the forecasts. I'd definitely use an app such as this.

sub_topics.name: differ
sub_topics.example: I really like many aspects of the mobile site. It's great to have both the forecast and observations together. But the information differs from what's on the full site, especially re chance of rain. Today the full site says there's a 90% chance of rain in Canberra while the mobile site says 30% or 50% at different times of day. I've noticed other similar errors over the past week. It would be great if this could be addressed.

sub_topics.name: colour
sub_topics.example: Design is elegant but some colour would make it much easier to read the forecasts at a glance -- eg. Some yellow for sunny days, ice blue for snow, etc. With the current design I find myself needing to spend too long looking for the details when I only want an overview.

sub_topics.name: navigation
sub_topics.example: Nice work guys, Menu is easy to navigate to where you want to go, all the data comes up in a nice format that is easy to read. Works pretty smoothly as well.

sub_topics.name: icon|symbol
sub_topics.example: Love the 7 days of forecasting A small icon representing the days weather would make it quick to understand.

sub_topics.name: layout
sub_topics.example: The mobile site is fantastic. I love the breakdown of rain to time slots and the layout is great. Very easy to access the radar and i can get the info i need for my suburb quickly. Great work!

sub_topics.name: clarity
sub_topics.example: I like it. Very clear and easy to navigate. Not cluttered with lots of unnecessary info.

sub_topics.name: information
sub_topics.example: Just want to day thank for this really useful site. Very useful during firefighting operations in the Northern Midlands of Tasmania over. The last few days. The layout of the information is perfect.

sub_topics.name: sunrise|sunset
sub_topics.example: I'd like to see sunrise and sunset times.as well as swell and tide information .then it would be perfect

sub_topics.name: sunny
sub_topics.example: Would be nice to also show if it's sunny, overcast etc as just having % chance of rainfall does not indicate the day. This for mobile site

sub_topics.name: uv
sub_topics.example: Can you add the SunSmart UV Alert information?

sub_topics.name: icon|symbol
sub_topics.example: I love the new mobile site, my only negative feedback is the colour of your sun symbol. The yellow one is cheery and reflects a sunny day but the bluish colour you have on the site reflects more like a grey day.

sub_topics.name: Empty
sub_topics.example: <blank>

sub_topics.name: Duplicate
sub_topics.example: Previous Comment: Your Radar map when enlarged is again cutting out Castle Hill and other suburbs north that we could view but now can't | Next Comment: Your Radar map when

sub_topics.name: Internal
sub_topics.example: email=xxx@bom.gov.au
